trans-unit.source: Represents a variable declaration.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en variabel deklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: CodeVariableDeclarationStatement can be used to represent code that declares a variable.
trans-unit.target: CodeVariableDeclarationStatement kan brukes til å representere kode som deklarerer en variabel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Type%2A> property specifies the type of the variable to declare.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Type%2A>egenskapen angir variabelen til deklarere.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Name%2A> property specifies the name of the variable to declare.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Name%2A>egenskapen angir navnet på variabelen til deklarere.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.InitExpression%2A> property is optional, and specifies an initialization expression to assign to the variable after it is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.InitExpression%2A>egenskapen er valgfri, og angir en initialisering uttrykk som skal tilordnes variabelen når den er opprettet.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement.InitExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some languages can implement the optional variable initialization expression by making a separate assignment statement after the variable declaration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen språk kan implementere valgfrie variabelen initialisering uttrykket ved å gjøre en egen tilordningen setningen etter variable-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"></xref> class using the specified type and name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitt type og navn.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> that indicates the data type of the variable.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"> </xref> som angir datatypen for variabelen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the variable.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på variabelen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"></xref> class using the specified data type name and variable name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeVariableDeclarationStatement"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av navn på angitt datatype og variabelnavn.

trans-unit.source: The name of the data type of the variable.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datatypen for variabelen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the variable.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på variabelen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the variable.
